name: musiXmatch
description: Available on iOS, Android, WP7 desktop Mac, W8 and Spotify, musiXmatch is currently the world’s largest and official Lyrics Catalogue with more than 10,000,000 users worldwide and primary destination on mobile and connected devices for Songs Lyrics passionate. musiXmatch keeps also available for developers, OEM, and Music Services an awesome Lyrics API which let them building their own service without caring about licensing agreement.
